title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 31.3 - Financial responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 31.3 - Financial responsibility

State Regulations

Every owner or operator of a major facility or vessel shall
establish and maintain with the department evidence of financial responsibility
in the following amounts: for major facilities, $50,000,000; for vessels, $300
per gross ton. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
31.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
